story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_01:
It’s pretty weird, working together with someone
from Team Galactic.
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_02:
Hmph. Right back at ya, kid. You’ve got
some nerve—
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_03: Oh, never mind. We’re cooperating now.
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_04: You must really care about Cyrus, huh?
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_05: Oh, shut it. It’s none of your business!
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_06:
Of course I care. We’re only teaming up with you
so we can find him.
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_07:
Once we’re done with this, I’d be happy to take
you down a few notches like before.
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_08:
Like before? You mean that time we battled at
Lake Verity? I’ll definitely win this time!
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_09:
Hmph. Like I’d lose to a goody-goody couple like
you and that little friend of yours.
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_10: Wh-what? Dawn and I aren’t a couple!
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_11:
I mean...I know I rely on her a lot...
Too much, really...
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_12:
But that’s why I want to win even when she’s
not here!
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_13:
Because then I can be proud that I won on
my own!
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_14:
Oh? So you’re a couple, but it’s a little
complicated, huh.
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_15: I-I just said, we’re not a couple!
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_16:
Whatever. Either way, let’s have another battle
once we’ve found Master Cyrus.
story_teamgalactic_02_06000/2401_1201_17:
I’ll show you again just how amazing Team
Galactic can be!
